Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory41.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Tch... I remember putting it here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Where did it go... This is bad...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Oh, here you are, Gray Raven Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Do you mind waiting for a bit? I'm looking for something.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are you looking for these?', 3: '10', 4: 'I found a pair of daggers. Is this it?', 5: '10'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Where did you find them?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I saw some children playing with them on the base, so I took them away in case the kids hurt themselves.', 3: '13'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I see... They probably took the daggers when they sneaked into my tent to play. Zachery can't really handle the kids, so...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Thank you. You did the right thing, even though the daggers have been dull for a long time. They won't hurt anybody.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'They look like daggers from the Golden Age.', 3: '17', 4: 'The daggers look beyond repair.', 5: '18'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You're right. There's no fixing them anymore.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You're right. They're something from the Golden Age. I've had them for a long time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Why do you have them in your tent?', 3: '20'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "...It's just a memento.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'A memento? But I thought you said...', 3: '22'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Forsaken doesn't have a lot of resources. Something like this should go into the furnace.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "But these took me a long time to make up my mind. I didn't melt them down in the end.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Sounds like there's a story.", 3: '25'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "...You're very insightful.", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's okay. Everyone has their secrets and reasons.", 3: '27'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Very thoughtful, too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...But why are you smiling?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I just find it refreshing to know that the Forsaken leader also has a secret like that.', 3: '32'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Hah, you little...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Thank you for finding them for me. It's getting late. We should continue our mission. Let's go.", 4: '1'}
